The longer thread from @thatguybg is here, telling:
- the origin story
- Launch House's mission
- other investors
- their thesis on the New Silicon Valley

https://t.co/aQCnduCE4t

With the events of the past few years, that the way we build startups has changed

Launch House is leaning into that, providing community, knowledge, and much more -- decentralized, not just in SF

As someone who's been in SF for 15 years this feels both crazy but inevitable

As @thatguybg says:

"the new silicon valley is:
- distributed across NYC, LA, SF AND online
- gen z & young millennial and extremely diverse
- web3 leaning
- founder friendly 
- (community/creator) distribution minded" https://t.co/uz1dsoAeg5

We are big believers in VR, games, and the next generation computing platforms. Alta VR is a super exciting instantiation of these trends, and the community and experience they've built is incredible

Excited to be working with Timo and team!

"Upon its release, it spent more than seven weeks at No. 1 on the Oculus charts, produced historical engagement metrics for the platform and currently hosts the No. 2 VR Discord community worldwide." -- via Venture Beat's article

ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸš€

So why Alta?

The Alta VR team is building "A Township Tale" - an open world VR RPG set in a medieval setting. You chop down trees, craft, fight, hang out with other people, and much more

Yes, it's a medieval metaverse ğŸ˜‚ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ‘©â€ğŸŒ¾ğŸ¥·

https://t.co/3k2LC0n7yv

First, you might ask- why VR?

The Quest 2 is *crushing* it and establishing the next new computing platform for games. Millions of units have been sold, and engagement in VR apps are way up

Charts here and a thread by a16z's @JackSoslow here- https://t.co/asmzO60TsP https://t.co/riEpLbPWwM

VR is one of our favorite areas of investment - I've been working with @JackSoslow (ex-Oculus) to double down

Today we have an announcement in this area - we're co-leading the $12M Series A of Alta VR (@RealAlta)

More here:
https://t.co/0mJyJG4LgE

Oh, and if you want to co-invest with us on Stonks, with Stonks, here's the Stonks link: https://t.co/DL1pc2Ptx9

Stonks.
Congratulations @ali_moiz and the @Stonks_dot_com team on all their success. The early numbers have been staggering. So excited to work together and start this adventure!

And third, a bunch of us at a16z are really excited about the future of startup investing

My colleague @dhaber recently wrote about the next gen of private exchanges: https://t.co/M3UMDhecBs

Startups are waiting longer IPO. And NFT > NYSE :) So new platforms have to be built

I also think video is the right format, particularly live video. The special thing about hearing a founder talk about their startup is that you can hear their excitement, their energy - and video can capture that. Slide decks are okay, but not enough

Stonks is all about video!

If startups, investors, and employees are going to be global, then we need a new digital-native medium for them to connect. And to invest.

In-person demo days in SF will be less important. Live video demo days will be ubiquitous. https://t.co/THksT7opJl helps drive this shift

Why did I invest?

- The future of startups will be global
- Video eats the world :)
- Startup stonks are the next new thing

First, the future of startups won't just be in SF. It's going to be all over, bc founders, investors, and employees are going to be located globally

I'm leading the latest round of Stonks ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤“ started by repeat founder @ali_moiz

Congrats to Alan (@alandescrag) and Klaus (@kbadelt)! Excited to be partners with you.

And here's an obligatory Wikipedia link for Klaus here: https://t.co/9OGu2GZwys. Such a wonderful story on how this company got started :)

I got super excited about what they'd built on a shoestring budget. The product lets you browse a huge catalog, see analytics on your films, and monetize them over time

It's a natural two-sided market that will explode as the world switches to digital-first entertainment https://t.co/m2jvacTZsx

Filmhub lets creators - both indie and established - list their TV shows + movies, which hosts and transcodes the content into all the right formats

New streaming apps - Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, IMDb TV, TCL, Tubi, Plex - can then license it with a few clicks

Big news!
I'm leading the Seed round for Filmhub, a new marketplace startup disrupting film in Hollywood!

Started by @kbadelt, a composer for films like The Thin Red Line, Gladiator, and Pirates of the Caribbean + @alandescrag, from the tech world.
